overview: Bill is immediately thrust into a compromising position of finding a dollar at his feet. As his mind whisks him away to another time in his life he realizes to keep this dollar would be like tempting the gods. He must make a choice between taking the lost dollar or finding its deprived owner. Bill becomes torn between the temptation of sin, or the glory of sacrifice.
tagline: The story of one man's moral dilemma after finding a dollar.
title: The Bill
